main event: A sighting of an elliptical object in the sky was reported in Springfield, Ohio on July 1, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light that was stationary before zigzagging and then departing., The witness felt the object's maneuvering was impossible for conventional aircraft., The sighting lasted for one minute and was confirmed to be visual on the ground., No photographs were included in the original sighting report despite a mention of photographs., The witness had difficulty estimating the object's size and speed.
witness description: male, age 32, no special education training mentioned
